title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 12
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 12
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Spartan Motors (SPAR). Spartan Motors Inc.'s shares rose to their highest price in almost a decade after the maker of chassis and emergency-service vehicles met with analysts and investors. Spartan said it's aiming for $1 billion in annual revenue by 2020. The target is 43 percent higher than this year's average sales estimate from analysts in a Bloomberg survey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
